introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.content: At Meeshy, we are committed to protecting your privacy and personal data. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information when you use our multilingual messaging service.

items.title: Customer support:
items.description: Responding to your questions and resolving issues

local.title: 4.1 Local Processing
local.content: All translations are performed on our secure servers with advanced AI models, ensuring high accuracy and reliability.

encryption.title: 4.2 Encryption
encryption.content: All communications between your browser and our servers are encrypted using TLS 1.3.

storage.title: 4.3 Secure Storage
storage.content: Data stored on our servers is protected by enterprise-grade security measures, including encryption at rest.

sharing.title: 5. Information Sharing
sharing.intro: We do not sell, rent, or share your personal information with third parties, except in the following cases:
cases: To protect our rights, property, or security
With trusted service providers (under confidentiality agreements)

rights.title: 6. Your Rights
rights.intro: In accordance with GDPR, you have the right to:
rights.contact: To exercise these rights, contact us at: privacy@meeshy.me

cookies.title: 7. Cookies and Similar Technologies
cookies.content: We use essential cookies for service functionality and analytical cookies to improve user experience. You can manage your cookie preferences in your browser settings.

updates.title: 8. Policy Updates
updates.content: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. Important changes will be communicated by email or via a notification in the application. The last update date is indicated at the top of this page.

contact.title: 9. Contact
contact.address: Address: 9 - 11 Avenue de l'Arche, Courbevoie 92400, France

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing and using Meeshy, you agree to be bound by these terms of use. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our service.

description.title: 2. Service Description
description.content: Meeshy is a multilingual messaging platform that uses artificial intelligence to automatically translate messages in real-time. Our service enables communication without language barriers directly in your browser.

acceptableUse.title: 3. Acceptable Use
items: Use the service for lawful purposes only
Not use the service to harm others
Not use the service to send spam or viruses
Not use the service to send illegal content

privacy.title: 4. Privacy and Data Protection
privacy.content: We are committed to protecting your privacy. Translations are performed on our secure servers with enterprise-grade encryption. No personal data is stored without your explicit consent. See our privacy policy for more details.

intellectualProperty.title: 5. Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.content: All content, features, and functionality of Meeshy are owned by Meeshy SAS and are protected by copyright, trademark, and other intellectual property laws.

limitation.title: 6. Limitation of Liability
limitation.content: Meeshy is provided "as is" without warranties of any kind. We are not liable for any damages arising from the use of our service.

termination.title: 7. Termination
termination.content: We reserve the right to terminate or suspend your access to our service at any time, with or without notice, for conduct that we believe violates these terms.

changes.title: 8. Changes to Terms
changes.content: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Changes will be effective immediately upon posting. Your continued use of the service constitutes acceptance of the modified terms.

contact.title: 9. Contact
contact.content: For questions about these terms, contact us at: legal@meeshy.me
